thread.section_title: Diesel Ops Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Diesel Ops | dieselops.com
thread.title: John Zadrovitz
thread.title_full: Diesel Ops reviewed by John Zadrovitz

author: John Zadrovitz
title: John Zadrovitz
text: This kit made an improved performance with the truck quite obvious. The installation was clearly stated and depicted. My technicians only issue was that there was NO instructions included with the product. He went onto the site and downloaded over 20 pages on the instructions and manual which I provided to the customer. For the cost of the kit,at least the installation guide could have been included. He had to take time to get this from your website,and you know,a technicians time is VALUABLE.
